alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 8:52PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cedar, Polk and northern Dade Counties through 945 PM CST... At 852 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Stockton to 10 miles north of Lockwood to near Golden City. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bolivar... Stockton Lake... Stockton State Park... Pomme de Terre Lake... Stockton... Greenfield... Humansville... Lockwood... Polk... Fair Play... Morrisville... Dadeville... Jerico Springs... Halfway... Flemington... Aldrich... Arcola... Umber View Heights... Bearcreek... Cane Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central and southwestern Missouri.
